          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">Steichen, Eduard J.: A Vasalóház este. Felvétel: 1904. Guminyomat platinotípián: 1909. 47,8 x 38,4 cm. The Metropolitan Museum of Art, New York.</string>
            <string language="en-US">Eduard J Steichen: The Flat Iron Building. Photo: 1904. Flexograph on Platinotype: 1909. 47,8 x 38,4 cm. The Metropolitan Museum of Art, New York.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eduard J Steichen: Das Flache 
Eisen-Gebäude. Foto: 1904. Flexograph auf 
Platinotype: 1909. 47.8 x 38.4 Zentimeter. Das 
Metropolitanmuseum der kunst, New York.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Eduard J Steichen : Le Bâtiment Plat de 
Fer. Photo : 1904. Flexograph sur Platinotype : 
1909. 47.8 x 38.4 centimètres. Le musée 
métropolitain de l'art, New York.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Eduard J Steichen: O Edifício Liso Do 
Ferro. Foto: 1904. Flexograph em Platinotype: 
1909. 47.8 x 38.4 cm. O museu metropolitano da arte,
New York.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Eduard J Steichen: La Costruzione Piana Del
Ferro. Foto: 1904. Flexograph su Platinotype: 
1909. 47.8 x 38.4 centimetri. Il museo metropolitano
di arte, New York.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Eduard j Steichen: Το επίπεδο κτήριο 
σιδήρου. Φωτογραφία: 1904. Flexograph σε 
Platinotype: 1909. 47.8 X 38.4 εκατ.. Το 
μητροπολιτικό μουσείο της τέχνης, Νέα Υόρκη.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Eduard J Steichen: El Edificio Plano Del 
Hierro. Foto: 1904. Flexograph en Platinotype: 
1909. 47.8 x 38.4 centímetros. El museo 
metropolitana del arte, Nueva York.</string>
          </title>
